channel.title: Client
channel.description: My client when i log into it it says player already logged in so what do i do?? :confused:

item.title: Client
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“Fear Nuture, post:7, topic:433828”]lol? why you gettin mad and shit im just helpin you minge. editing player.cfg isn’t the only way to kick someone whos stuck logged in out of server moron…

and you know this is easyrsc source right? it takes all of 10 minutes to know everything about it. its not hard to know anything about this source.[/quote]

With EasyRSC, a player can be ‘logged in’ but doesn’t appear logged in on the control panel, therefore the only way to fix that char is by editing the CFG. The ‘kick’ option on the control panel will only appear if that player is appearing ‘online’ on the control panel.

Read full topic

item.title: Client
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

So? … Don’t act like you know what’s going on when you don’t know a thing about the source … He was stuck in online mode whch meant his player template still had a value of true next to ‘Loggedn=’.

Read full topic

item.title: Client
item.dc:creator: @Fear_Nuture Fear Nuture
item.description:
@Fear_Nuture wrote:

[quote=“freaky5000, post:4, topic:433828”][quote author=Fear Nuture link=topic=536545.msg3923822#msg3923822 date=1329992489]

What source are you using? I’m guessing EasyRSC.

Check in the “player.cfg” if the loggedin=true - Put it at false.

like he said but if you want, you can select Kick from the server GUI and kick the stuck player.
[/quote]

Fear Nuture, his player template was stuck in online mode, however he was offline, you can only edit/fix this via the cfg file.[/quote]

he said nothing about player templates…
Just so you know…

Read full topic

item.title: Client
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

[quote=“Fear Nuture, post:3, topic:433828”][quote author=Crooks link=topic=536545.msg3922878#msg3922878 date=1329904905]
What source are you using? I’m guessing EasyRSC.

Check in the “player.cfg” if the loggedin=true - Put it at false.
[/quote]

like he said but if you want, you can select Kick from the server GUI and kick the stuck player.[/quote]

Fear Nuture, his player template was stuck in online mode, however he was offline, you can only edit/fix this via the cfg file.

Read full topic
